understandingFriend.title: Understanding Friend

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This privacy policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, and protected when you use the Aeonova application. Your data privacy is our priority.

dataCollection.title: What Data Do We Collect?
dataCollection.content: As Aeonova, we collect minimal data to provide you with the best experience:

items.memories: Memories and diary entries you share

dataUsage.title: How Do We Use Your Data?
dataUsage.content: The data we collect is used only for the following purposes:

dataProtection.title: How Do We Protect Your Data?
dataProtection.content: We take industry-standard measures for the security of your data:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

legalBasis.title: Legal Bases for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

items.consent: Your consent where required (you can withdraw at any time)
items.contract: Performance of a contract or steps prior to entering into a contract
items.legitimateInterests: Our legitimate interests, balanced against your rights and freedoms
items.vitalInterests: Protection of vital interests of you or another person

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We share your data only when necessary and with appropriate safeguards:

items.serviceProviders: Trusted service providers who process data on our behalf (hosting, security, notifications)
items.analyticsPartners: Analytics partners to improve performance and quality (only with consent, anonymized when possible)
items.legalAuthorities: Public authorities when required by law or to protect legal rights
items.businessTransfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset transfers, subject to this policy
items.safetySecurity: To investigate, prevent, or act regarding fraud, abuse, or security incidents

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: If we transfer your data outside the EEA, we ensure an adequate level of protection:

items.eea: Primary processing within the EEA whenever possible
items.safeguards: Appropriate safeguards such as encryption and strict access controls
items.scc: Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission (where applicable)
items.complaints: You may contact us or your local Data Protection Authority for concerns

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy.
dataRetention.summary: For detailed retention periods across all data categories, please see our dedicated Data Retention Policy.

cookiesNote.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookiesNote.content: Our mobile app does not use web cookies. The website uses essential cookies and optional analytics only with your consent.

exerciseRights.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exerciseRights.content: You can exercise your privacy rights using the following methods:

items.inApp: In-App Settings: Manage data, export, or delete your account
items.email: Email: Contact dpo@aeonova.com or privacy@aeonova.com for specific requests
items.verification: Identity verification: We may request proof of identity to protect your account
items.responseTimes: Response times: We respond within 30 days, extensions possible for complex requests

children.title: Children‚Äôs Privacy
children.content: Aeonova is not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us so we can delete it.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of material changes as appropriate. Last updated: {date}

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our privacy policy:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Rules you must follow when using Aeonova

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance and Agreement
acceptance.content: By using the Aeonova application, you declare that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms of service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: Aeonova is an AI-powered personal diary and chat application.

items.saveMemories: Save daily memories and get evaluations

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use the Service. If you are under the age of majority in your jurisdiction, you may use the Service only with the consent and supervision of a parent or legal guardian who agrees to these Terms.

accounts.title: 4. Accounts and Security
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

items.notification: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use or security breach
items.devices: You are responsible for securing your devices used to access the Service

userContent.title: 5. User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of the content you submit (memories, messages, posts). By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to host, store, display, and process your content solely for operating and improving the Service.

items.rights: You must have the necessary rights to the content you submit
items.noIllegal: Do not submit content that is illegal, infringing, or violates others' rights
items.moderation: We may remove or restrict content that violates these Terms or applicable laws

acceptableUse.title: 6. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to misuse the Service or help anyone else do so.

items.abuse: No harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or threats
items.violence: No violent, self-harm encouraging, or sexually exploitative content
items.spam: No spam, scams, or deceptive practices
items.malware: No malware, bots, or attempts to disrupt or overload the Service
items.impersonation: No impersonation or misrepresentation of your identity
items.illegal: No illegal activities or promotion of illegal acts

aiDisclaimer.title: 7. AI Output and No Professional Advice
aiDisclaimer.content: Content generated by Aeonova's AI may be inaccurate or incomplete. AI outputs are provided for informational and entertainment purposes only and do not constitute professional advice (including medical, legal, or financial advice). Always use your own judgment and seek qualified professionals when needed.

payments.title: 8. Subscriptions, Payments, and In‚ÄëApp Purchases
payments.content: Certain features may require a paid subscription or one‚Äëtime purchase through the applicable app store.

items.billing: Billing is handled by the App Store or Google Play; their terms and policies apply
items.renewal: Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled before the renewal date
items.pricing: We may change prices or features with prior notice where required
items.cancellation: You can manage or cancel your subscription via your app store account settings

refunds.title: 9. Refunds
refunds.content: Refunds are governed by the policies of the platform through which you made the purchase (App Store or Google Play). Where permitted by law and platform policy, you may request a refund through the respective store.

intellectualProperty.title: 10. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service, including its design, features, and content (excluding user content), is owned by Aeonova or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our prior written consent.

thirdPartyServices.title: 11. Third‚ÄëParty Services
thirdPartyServices.content: The Service may link to or integrate with third‚Äëparty services. We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third‚Äëparty services. Your use of third‚Äëparty services is subject to their terms and privacy policies.

responsibilities.title: 12. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: As a user, you have the following responsibilities:

prohibited.title: 13. Prohibited Behaviors
prohibited.content: The following behaviors are strictly prohibited:

disclaimer.title: 14. Disclaimers
disclaimer.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON‚ÄëINFRINGEMENT.

limitation.title: 15. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Aeonova and its affiliates will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, exemplary, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, or goodwill, resulting from your use of the Service.

indemnification.title: 16. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Aeonova, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys‚Äô fees) arising out of or related to your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.

termination.title: 17. Account Termination
termination.content: Your account may be terminated in the following cases:

governingLaw.title: 18. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of your country of residence to the extent required by mandatory consumer protection rules; otherwise, they are governed by the laws of Germany without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

items.venue: Courts with appropriate jurisdiction will have exclusive jurisdiction except where applicable law provides otherwise
items.eu: EU consumers may also have the right to use an EU online dispute resolution platform

changes.title: 19. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms from time to time. If we make material changes, we will provide appropriate notice as required by law. Continued use of the Service after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: 20. Contact
contact.content: For questions about our terms of service:

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.subtitle: European Union General Data Protection Regulation
gdpr.summary: As Aeonova, we are fully committed to protecting your personal data in compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This comprehensive policy explains your rights, how we process your data, and our commitment to data protection.

introduction.title: üìã Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Understanding GDPR Compliance
introduction.description: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a comprehensive privacy law that gives you control over your personal data. As a responsible AI company, Aeonova ensures full compliance with GDPR requirements, providing you with transparency, control, and security over your personal information.

items.whoIsProtected: All EU residents, regardless of where they are located
items.whatIsProtected: Any personal data that can identify you directly or indirectly
items.whenApplies: Whenever we process your personal data for any purpose
items.whereApplies: All our services, including mobile app and website

principles.title: üîí Data Protection Principles
principles.subtitle: Our Foundation
principles.description: We adhere to the fundamental principles of GDPR in all our data processing activities:

lawfulness.title: 1. Lawfulness, Fairness & Transparency
lawfulness.description: We process your data lawfully, fairly, and transparently

details.lawful: Processing is based on valid legal grounds (consent, contract, legitimate interest)
details.fair: We don't use your data in ways that would be unexpected or harmful
details.transparent: We clearly explain what we do with your data in plain language

purposeLimitation.title: 2. Purpose Limitation
purposeLimitation.description: Data is collected and used only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes

details.specific: We clearly define why we need each piece of data
details.explicit: Purposes are stated clearly, not hidden in complex terms
details.legitimate: All purposes serve genuine business or user needs

dataMinimization.title: 3. Data Minimization
dataMinimization.description: We collect only the data that is necessary for our stated purposes

details.adequate: We collect enough data to provide our services effectively
details.relevant: All collected data is relevant to our stated purposes
details.limited: We don't collect excessive or unnecessary information

accuracy.title: 4. Accuracy
accuracy.description: We keep your data accurate and up to date

details.current: We provide tools for you to update your information
details.correction: Inaccurate data is corrected or deleted without delay
details.verification: We verify data accuracy when processing important information

storageLimitation.title: 5. Storage Limitation
storageLimitation.description: We don't keep your data longer than necessary

details.retention: Clear retention periods for different types of data
details.review: Regular review and deletion of data that's no longer needed
details.purpose: Data is deleted when the purpose for collection has ended

security.title: 6. Integrity & Confidentiality
security.description: We protect your data with appropriate security measures

details.protection: Technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access
details.confidentiality: Your data is kept confidential and secure
details.integrity: We ensure data is not altered or corrupted

accountability.title: 7. Accountability
accountability.description: We are responsible for demonstrating compliance with these principles

details.documentation: We maintain records of all processing activities
details.policies: Clear internal policies and procedures for data protection
details.training: Regular staff training on data protection requirements

rights.title: üë• Your GDPR Rights
rights.subtitle: Your Complete Rights Package
rights.description: GDPR gives you comprehensive rights over your personal data. Here's what you can do:

information.title: 1. üìã Right to Information
information.description: You have the right to know how your data is processed

items.categories: What types of data we collect
items.recipients: Who we share data with (if anyone)
items.retention: How long we keep your data
items.rights: What rights you have regarding your data
items.sources: Where we got your data from

information.howToExercise: This privacy policy provides most of this information. For specific details, contact us.

access.title: 2. üîç Right to Access
access.description: You can request a copy of all data we hold about you

items.copy: A complete copy of your personal data
items.format: Data in a structured, machine-readable format (JSON)
items.details: Information about how the data is processed
items.recipients: Who the data has been shared with

access.howToExercise: Request through app settings or email dpo@aeonova.com. First request is free, additional requests may have a fee.

rectification.title: 3. ‚úèÔ∏è Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You can correct inaccurate or incomplete data

items.verify: Ask us to verify data accuracy

rectification.howToExercise: Update directly in app settings or contact us for data you can't change yourself
rectification.timeframe: Corrections made immediately where possible, complex cases within 30 days

erasure.title: 4. üóëÔ∏è Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
erasure.description: You can request deletion of your personal data

items.unnecessary: Data is no longer necessary for the original purpose
items.consent: You withdraw consent and there's no other legal basis
items.objection: You object to processing and there are no overriding legitimate grounds
items.legal: Deletion is required for legal compliance

limitations.title: We may refuse deletion if data is needed for:

erasure.howToExercise: Delete account in app settings or contact dpo@aeonova.com
erasure.timeframe: Account deletion processed within 7 days, complete data deletion within 30 days

portability.title: 5. üì¶ Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You can receive your data in a portable format or transfer it to another service

items.receive: Get your data in JSON or CSV format
items.transfer: Have us transfer data directly to another service (where technically feasible)
items.export: Export your memories, chat history, and settings

portability.limitations: Only applies to data you provided and data processed by automated means based on consent or contract
portability.howToExercise: Export feature in app settings or request via dpo@aeonova.com
portability.timeframe: Available immediately through app, custom requests within 30 days

objection.title: 6. ‚úã Right to Object
objection.description: You can object to certain types of data processing

general.title: General Objection
general.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
general.effect: We'll stop processing unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds

directMarketing.title: Direct Marketing
directMarketing.effect: We'll immediately stop all marketing to you

profiling.title: Automated Decision-Making & Profiling
profiling.description: Object to automated decisions that significantly affect you
profiling.effect: We'll review automated decisions and provide human review where applicable

objection.howToExercise: Marketing: Unsubscribe links or app settings. Other objections: Contact dpo@aeonova.com

contact.title: üìû Contact Us About GDPR
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: For any questions or requests regarding GDPR and data protection:

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpo.role: Our DPO oversees all data protection activities and GDPR compliance

requests.title: GDPR Rights Requests
requests.description: For exercising your GDPR rights (access, deletion, etc.)

complaints.title: Complaints and Concerns
complaints.description: For privacy concerns or complaints about our data handling

general.title: General Questions
general.description: For general questions about our privacy practices

response.title: Response Times
response.complex: Complex requests: May extend to 90 days with explanation

items.identification: Your name and email address associated with your account
items.request: Clear description of your request or concern
items.details: Any relevant details or reference numbers

languages.title: Language Support
languages.description: We can respond to GDPR requests in English, German, or Turkish

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Use of cookies and similar technologies on our website
cookies.summary: This policy explains how Aeonova uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website. Our main service is the mobile application, and this website serves primarily for information and download purposes.

introduction.title: üìù Introduction
introduction.description: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them on the Aeonova website, and how you can manage your cookie preferences. By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: üç™ What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

items.functionality: Enable basic website functionality and navigation
items.analytics: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
items.performance: Improve website performance and loading times

types.title: Cookie Types by Duration:
types.session: Session Cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
types.persistent: Persistent Cookies: Remain on your device for a set period or until manually deleted

typesOfCookies.title: üîç Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.description: We categorize our cookies into different types based on their purpose and functionality:

essential.title: 1. üîí Essential Cookies (Always Active)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be switched off in our systems.

items.language: Language Preference: Stores your selected language setting for the website
items.security: Security Cookies: CSRF protection tokens and other security measures
items.session: Session Management: Maintains your session state across page navigation
items.consent: Cookie Consent: Remembers your cookie preferences and consent choices

essential.note: ‚ö†Ô∏è These cookies cannot be disabled as they are essential for website functionality
essential.legalBasis: Legal basis: Legitimate interest (essential for service provision)

performance.title: 2. üìä Performance & Analytics Cookies (Optional)
performance.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.

items.loadTimes: Page Performance: Measures page load times and performance metrics
items.errorTracking: Error Reporting: Tracks JavaScript errors and technical issues anonymously
items.usageStats: Usage Analytics: Tracks which pages are visited and popular content
items.userFlow: User Journey: Understands how users navigate through our website

performance.note: ‚úÖ You can reject these cookies without affecting website functionality

marketing.title: 3. üéØ Marketing & Advertising Cookies (Currently Not Used)
marketing.description: We currently do not use marketing cookies, but may implement them in the future with your consent.

items.targetedAds: Targeted Advertising: Would show relevant ads based on your interests
items.socialMedia: Social Media Integration: Would enable social media sharing and tracking
items.remarketing: Remarketing: Would show ads to previous website visitors
items.crossSite: Cross-site Tracking: Would track your activity across different websites

marketing.note: üö´ Currently not implemented - will require explicit consent if added
marketing.future: If we decide to use these cookies in the future, we will ask for your explicit consent and update this policy accordingly.

thirdParty.title: üåê Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Our website may contain embedded content or services from third parties. These services may set their own cookies:

items.fonts: Google Fonts: For website typography (no tracking cookies)
items.cdn: Content Delivery Networks: For faster content loading
items.security: Security Services: For DDoS protection and security monitoring

items.analytics: Google Analytics: For detailed website analytics
items.social: Social Media Widgets: For social media integration
items.support: Customer Support Tools: For live chat and support features

thirdParty.note: We will always inform you before implementing any new third-party services that use tracking cookies.

mobileApp.title: üì± Mobile App Data Storage
mobileApp.subtitle: Important Distinction
mobileApp.description: The Aeonova mobile application does not use web cookies. Instead, it uses native mobile data storage methods that are more secure and efficient:

items.localStorage: Local Encrypted Storage: User data is stored securely on your device
items.keychain: Keychain/Keystore: Authentication tokens stored in device's secure storage
items.appSettings: Application Preferences: Settings stored within the app's sandbox
items.offlineCache: Offline Capabilities: Cached content for offline usage
items.biometric: Biometric Data: Face ID/Touch ID data (stored locally, never transmitted)

items.encryption: All data is encrypted using industry-standard encryption
items.localOnly: Sensitive data never leaves your device
items.secure: Uses platform-specific security features (iOS Keychain, Android Keystore)
items.privacy: No cross-app tracking or data sharing

management.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Managing Your Cookies
management.description: You have several options to control and manage cookies on our website:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings:
browserSettings.description: You can control cookies through your browser settings:

items.chrome: Chrome: Settings ‚Üí Privacy and Security ‚Üí Cookies and other site data
items.firefox: Firefox: Options ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Cookies and Site Data
items.safari: Safari: Preferences ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Manage Website Data
items.edge: Edge: Settings ‚Üí Cookies and site permissions ‚Üí Cookies and site data

ourSettings.title: Website Cookie Preferences:
ourSettings.description: You can manage your cookie preferences for this website:

items.essential: Essential cookies: Cannot be disabled (required for website function)
items.performance: Performance cookies: Can be enabled/disabled in cookie banner
items.marketing: Marketing cookies: Not currently used, but will be opt-in if implemented

consequences.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Disabling Cookies:
consequences.description: If you disable certain cookies, some website features may not work properly:

items.language: Language preference will not be remembered
items.navigation: Some navigation features may be affected
items.performance: We cannot improve website performance based on usage data

updates.title: üîÑ Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.
updates.notification: When we make changes to this policy:

items.notice: We will post the updated policy on this page
items.effective: Changes become effective immediately upon posting
items.major: For significant changes, we may provide additional notice
items.date: The 'Last Updated' date at the top will be revised

updates.recommendation: We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.

contact.title: üìû Questions About Cookies
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:

dataRetention.title: Data Retention Policy
dataRetention.subtitle: How long we keep your personal data and why
dataRetention.summary: This comprehensive policy explains how long we retain different types of your personal data, the legal basis for retention, and your rights regarding data deletion. We are committed to data minimization and only keep data as long as necessary.

introduction.title: üìã Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Understanding Data Retention
introduction.description: Data retention refers to how long we keep your personal information in our systems. This policy explains our retention practices, which are designed to balance your privacy rights with our legitimate business needs and legal obligations.

items.minimization: We only collect and retain data that is necessary for our services
items.purpose: Data is retained only for the purposes for which it was collected
items.lawful: Retention periods are based on legal requirements and legitimate interests
items.transparent: We are transparent about how long we keep different types of data
items.secure: All retained data is protected with appropriate security measures

legalBasis.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Legal Basis for Data Retention
legalBasis.subtitle: Why We Retain Your Data
legalBasis.description: We retain personal data based on several legal grounds under GDPR and other applicable privacy laws:

contractual.title: 1. üìù Contractual Obligations
contractual.description: Data necessary to provide our services and fulfill our contract with you

items.account: Account information needed to provide the Aeonova service
items.subscription: Payment and subscription data for premium features
items.support: Customer support records to resolve issues
items.preferences: User preferences and settings to personalize your experience

legal.title: 2. üèõÔ∏è Legal Compliance
legal.description: Data we must retain to comply with legal obligations

items.financial: Financial records for tax and accounting purposes (7 years)
items.security: Security logs for investigating fraud and abuse (2 years)
items.gdpr: Records of consent and data processing activities (3 years)
items.disputes: Data related to legal disputes until resolution

legitimate.title: 3. üéØ Legitimate Interests
legitimate.description: Data retained for legitimate business purposes, balanced against your privacy rights

items.analytics: Anonymized usage data to improve our services (90 days)
items.security: Security monitoring to protect all users (1 year)
items.research: Product development and research (anonymized data only)

categories.title: ‚è∞ Detailed Retention Periods by Data Category
categories.subtitle: Specific Timeframes
categories.description: Below are the specific retention periods for different types of data we collect:

account.title: üë§ Account and Profile Information

basic.period: While account is active + 30 days after deletion
basic.deletion: Automatically deleted 30 days after account deletion

preferences.data: Language preference, app settings, notification preferences

account.note: üí° Account deletion is irreversible after the 30-day grace period. During this period, you can restore your account by logging in.

content.title: üí¨ Chat and Content Data

chatHistory.data: AI chat conversations and message history
chatHistory.period: Stored locally on device - unlimited / Server cache: 30 days
chatHistory.deletion: Server data deleted after 30 days; local data controlled by user

privateMemories.data: Personal diary entries and private memories
privateMemories.period: User controlled - can be deleted anytime
privateMemories.deletion: Immediately when deleted by user or upon account deletion

sharedMemories.deletion: Available for 1 year for moderation purposes, then permanently deleted

userFeedback.data: Ratings and feedback on AI responses
userFeedback.deletion: Anonymized after 90 days, fully deleted after 2 years

content.note: üí° Most chat data is stored locally on your device for privacy. Only minimal server caching is used for performance.

technical.title: üîß Technical and System Data

usageLogs.data: App usage patterns, feature usage, session data
usageLogs.deletion: Personal identifiers removed after 30 days, fully deleted after 90 days

errorReports.data: Crash reports, error logs, performance data
errorReports.deletion: No personal data included; technical data deleted after 1 year

securityLogs.data: Login attempts, security events, fraud detection

deviceInfo.data: Device type, OS version, app version

notifications.deletion: Immediately invalidated upon account deletion or opt-out

technical.note: üí° Technical data is primarily used for improving app performance and security. Personal identifiers are removed as soon as possible.

marketingConsent.deletion: Immediately upon withdrawal, with 1-year audit trail

automaticDeletion.title: ü§ñ Automatic Data Deletion
automaticDeletion.subtitle: Automated Processes
automaticDeletion.description: We have implemented automated systems to ensure data is deleted according to our retention schedules:

items.expired: Expired session tokens and temporary data
items.cache: Expired cache data and temporary files
items.logs: Rotation of log files exceeding retention periods

items.accounts: Accounts marked for deletion beyond grace period
items.anonymization: Anonymization of usage data older than 30 days
items.backups: Cleanup of backup files exceeding retention periods

items.technical: Technical logs and error reports beyond retention
items.audit: Full audit of all retention compliance

items.alerts: Automated alerts for any retention policy violations
items.verification: Verification that deleted data cannot be recovered

active.title: üü¢ Active Accounts
active.description: For accounts that are actively used and in good standing:

items.normalStorage: All data is stored according to standard retention periods
items.userControl: Users can delete their own data at any time through the app
items.backups: Regular encrypted backups are maintained for data recovery
items.security: Full security measures and monitoring are applied
items.updates: Data can be updated and modified by the user
items.export: Users can export their data at any time

inactive.title: üü° Inactive Accounts
inactive.description: For accounts that haven't been used for extended periods:

items.warning: Email warning sent after 12 months of inactivity
items.finalNotice: Final notice sent after 18 months of inactivity
items.deletion: Account marked for deletion after 24 months of inactivity
items.gracePeriod: 30-day final grace period before permanent deletion
items.dataMinimization: Non-essential data may be deleted during inactivity

inactive.note: üí° You can reactivate your account anytime by logging in, which resets the inactivity timer.

items.gracePeriod: 30-day grace period during which you can restore your account
items.dataReview: Personal data is reviewed for legal retention requirements
items.permanentDeletion: After grace period, all personal data is permanently deleted
items.legalException: Only data required by law is retained (anonymized when possible)
items.noRecovery: Deletion is irreversible after the grace period
items.confirmation: Email confirmation sent when deletion is complete

suspended.title: üö´ Suspended Accounts
suspended.description: For accounts suspended due to terms violations:

items.retention: Data is retained during suspension period for investigation
items.appeal: Data available for appeal process (up to 90 days)
items.deletion: If suspension becomes permanent, normal deletion process applies
items.reinstatement: Upon reinstatement, normal retention policies resume

userRights.title: üë• Your Data Retention Rights
userRights.subtitle: What You Can Do
userRights.description: You have several rights regarding how long we keep your data:

access.title: üîç Right to Access
access.description: You can request information about what data we have and how long we plan to keep it

items.request: Submit a data access request via email or in-app
items.response: We'll provide a comprehensive report within 30 days
items.format: Data provided in a structured, machine-readable format
items.frequency: You can request this information once per year for free

deletion.title: üóëÔ∏è Right to Deletion (Right to be Forgotten)
deletion.description: You can request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances

items.immediate: Account deletion through app settings (immediate processing)
items.selective: Request deletion of specific data categories
items.legal: We may refuse if required by law to retain the data
items.verification: Identity verification required for deletion requests

portability.title: üì¶ Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You can request a copy of your data in a portable format

items.export: Download your data directly from the app
items.format: Data provided in JSON or CSV format
items.scope: Includes all personal data we hold about you
items.transfer: Can be used to transfer to another service

objection.title: ‚úã Right to Object
objection.description: You can object to certain types of data processing and retention

items.marketing: Opt out of marketing data retention immediately
items.analytics: Object to analytics data collection and retention
items.profiling: Object to automated decision-making and profiling
items.legitimate: Challenge retention based on legitimate interests

specialCircumstances.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Special Circumstances
specialCircumstances.subtitle: Extended Retention
specialCircumstances.description: In certain situations, we may need to retain data beyond normal periods:

legal.title: üèõÔ∏è Legal Proceedings
legal.description: Data may be retained longer if involved in legal proceedings

items.litigation: Data preserved during active litigation or investigation
items.subpoena: Retention extended when subject to subpoena or court order
items.investigation: Fraud or security investigations may require extended retention
items.notification: You will be notified if your data is subject to legal hold

security.title: üîí Security Incidents
security.description: Security-related data may be retained for incident response

items.breaches: Security logs retained for breach investigation and prevention
items.forensics: Digital forensics may require temporary extended retention
items.patterns: Anonymized data used to identify attack patterns
items.reporting: Data may be retained for regulatory reporting requirements

financial.title: üí∞ Financial Obligations
financial.description: Financial data subject to longer retention periods

items.tax: Financial records retained for 7 years for tax purposes
items.audit: Payment data retained for financial audits
items.disputes: Billing disputes may extend retention periods
items.refunds: Refund eligibility periods may affect retention

dataLocations.title: üåç Data Storage Locations and Retention
dataLocations.subtitle: Where Your Data Is Stored
dataLocations.description: Data retention periods may vary based on storage location and applicable laws:

primary.title: Primary Storage (EU/EEA)
primary.description: Main data storage in European Economic Area

items.location: Primary servers located in Germany and Netherlands
items.law: Subject to GDPR and EU privacy laws
items.retention: Standard retention periods as outlined in this policy

items.locations: Secure facilities in EU and Switzerland
items.encryption: End-to-end encryption with separate key management
items.deletion: Backup deletion follows primary data deletion

items.duration: Cache data retained for maximum 30 days
items.anonymization: No personal identifiers in cached content

compliance.title: üìú Regulatory Compliance
compliance.subtitle: Meeting Legal Requirements
compliance.description: Our retention practices comply with various international privacy regulations:

items.lawfulness: All retention based on lawful processing grounds

items.disclosure: Clear disclosure of retention periods to California residents
items.deletion: Right to deletion honored within 45 days
items.business: Business purpose clearly defined for each retention period

items.local: Compliance with applicable local privacy laws

contact.title: üìû Contact and Requests
contact.subtitle: How to Reach Us
contact.description: For any questions or requests regarding data retention:

methods.app: Preferred: App Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Delete Account

requirements.confirmation: Email confirmation sent to registered address

process.external: EU residents: Contact your local Data Protection Authority
process.escalation: Escalation process available for unresolved matters
